snippet.title: Neon Abyss Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
Neon Abyss is an action platformer that combines your own luck with costume changes, weapon modification, pet hatching, and dungeon crawling. Battle your way through an underworld eternally in flux and crush the new gods of bitcoin and night club, combine your loot to achieve awesome power, and find the lost artifact: Pandora's Box. 


For more information on Neon Abyss, Follow these channels:

Website - https://www.veewo.com/neonabyss
Discord - https://discord.gg/njbrqT
Twitter - https://twitter.com/neonabyssgame
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/NeonAbyss/
